amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase FDA funding by $40,000 in order to validate a Tulane University Medical School diagnostic test on Gulf War illnesses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the appropriation for FDA Salaries and Expenses by $40,000 from $1,267,178,000 to $1,267,218,000. The increase is offset by a reduction of similar funds from the Departmental Administration account for the Agriculture Department.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Metcalf amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
